name: corpse
description: A simple HAR file replay for testing HTTP request and response exchanges

scripts.test: npm run build && babel-node $(which tape) ./spec/**/*.spec.js | faucet
scripts.test-file: babel src/$FILE.js --out-file lib/$FILE.js && clear && babel-node $(which tape) spec/lib/$FILE.spec.js || true
scripts.build: babel src --out-dir lib && babel index.js --out-file main.js

author: Bryon Bean <bryonbean@gmail.com>
